1370: Gheynekine moved to Verckens merct.B.3 after marriage.
Got married to Oda at age 27 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Oda, Oda, at age 27.
1371: Had a daughter with Oda, Aleberna, at age 28.
1374: Lost daughter Aleberna when Aleberna was 4 years old.
1375: Had a son with Oda, Rembrecht, at age 32.
1377: Had a son with Oda, Butsel, at age 34.
1378: Had a son with Oda, Michiel, at age 35.
1380: Lost son Butsel when Butsel was 4 years old.
1381: Had a daughter with Oda, Jute, at age 38.
1384: Lost daughter Jute when Jute was 4 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
